item.description:
Feel free to bring Snacks and Munchies, drinks or take out.

2nd Monday meetings to practice Mandarin conversation. Learners of all levels, and native speakers welcome!
This is an opportunity to meet with other learners and practice whatever you'd like to work on. Bring any books or homework you would like to review, and ask a native speaker to help you with pronounciation.

Hopefully we will try translate and read a song or poem or something in Chinese with ping ying.

Adele

Â
